xml.data:
Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 14 Parittārammaṇattika » 14.1 Paṭiccavāra » 14.1.1 Paccayānuloma » 14.1.1.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Hetu
Parittārammaṇattika
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayānuloma
Vibhaṅgavāra
Hetu
1.
2157Parittārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca parittārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—  parittārammaṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā…pe…  dve khandhā. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe parittārammaṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā…pe…  dve khandhā. (1)
2158Mahaggatārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca mahaggatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—  mahaggatārammaṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā…pe…  dve khandhā. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe mahaggatārammaṇaṃ…pe… . (1)
2159Appamāṇārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca appamāṇārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—  appamāṇārammaṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā…pe…  dve khandhā. (1)
<< 14.1.1.1 Vibhaṅgavāraup Ārammaṇādi >>
